!Collector Gouph: Hey, young friend! Have you ever heard of the jewel called the star diamond? It's a very rare gem of which only twelve exist on the entire continent. Due to a recent stroke of luck, I've managed to obtain one of those star diamonds ... It will be delivered here in few days ... I am so excited ...! Hoo Hoo Hoo ... (Quest for Dwarven characters level 10 and above.)
